channel.title: Assumptions on Marlow's Listener
channel.description: Recent content in Assumptions on Marlow's Listener

item.title: Generation gap
item.description: Truth must change her fashion It is not too much to say that no formula which expresses clearly the thought of one generation, can convey the same meaning to the generation which follows. Brooke Foss Westcott, D.D., D.C.L Bishop of Durham, Late Regius Professor of Divinity, Cambridge, and Canon of Westminster
